Name: Neon Sundown
About the game: Neon Sundown is a fast-paced roguelite shooter where you mow down hundreds of enemies at a time in different challenging arenas. Build a powerful arsenal of weapons using a variety of different playing cards unlocked through the in-game XP system, and try to take down the enemies that reside in each arena. Game Features... A variety of unique playing cards to use A powerful arsenal of ships to choose from Numerous diverse and challenging arenas Unlockable power modules to upgrade your ship An array of different enemies to take on
Meta Title: Neon Sundown: Mar 18, 2022, Ben Nichols and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Neon Sundown? Check out the release date (Mar 18, 2022), developer insights from Ben Nichols, and a complete game summary.
